scripts.prepublish: yarn run api:generate && lerna run prepublish
scripts.start:app: yarn run build && yarn --cwd example && yarn --cwd example start
scripts.api:generate: openapi-merge-cli && openapi-generator-cli generate -i mas-mock/merged-openapi.yaml -g typescript-axios -o packages/api --additional-properties=ngVersion=6.1.7,npmName=@kas-connectors/api,supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true --skip-validate-spec
